Bukky Wright (onye amụrụ n'abali iri-atọ na otu n’ime ọnwa atọ n'afọ 1967) bụ onye obodo Nigeria na- azụ ahia
Bukky bidoro ọrụ mepụta egwuregwu ya n'afọ 1996
O gosipụtala n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Nollywood nke asụsụ Yoruba na asụsụ Bekee, gụnyere usoro Wale Adenuga's nke televishọn  Super story
E wezụga ime ihe egwuruegwu, ọ na- akwa akwa na erekwa ere, B Collections na spa mara mma, B Wright
Ọ bịanyela aka na nkwado dị iche iche dị ka Chivita

N’afọ 2011, o ritere ihe nrite kacha mma nke Nollywood n’afọ. N’afọ 2014, Bukky Wright zọrọ ọkwa Honorable na Ogun State House of Assembly n’okpuru ọkwa nke Social Democratic Party (SDP) nke onye bụbu Gọvanọ Olusegun Osoba na-edu
